      the currently played cards and that it's a new reound

      private void sendWin()
      Sends info that the game is over to all players.
      It also sends the list of what place each player ended up on.

      • handleMessage

        Handles string messages received from the client
        Makes sure that only the current player can send messages
        Parameters:

        message - The message received

      • handleWildMessage

        private void handleWildMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Gets the color of the message and sets it to the current played wild card
        Parameters:
        message - The message containing the color that was picked

      • handlePlayMessage

        private void handlePlayMessage(Player player,
                               java.lang.String message)
        Checks if the current player have the provided card and then executes it. If the played card doesn't require an input or the game wasn't won the next turn info is sent.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that sent the message
        message - The message containing the played card

      • getMatchingCardFromPlayer

        private Card getMatchingCardFromPlayer(Card card)
        Checks if the player have the card that was played and return the reference of that card
        Parameters:
        card - The card to look for at the player
        Returns:
        It the player have the card it's returned else null is returned

      • handleDrawCardMessage

        private void handleDrawCardMessage()
        Draws a card for the current player and changes to the next turn
        Logs the outcome

      • handleUnoMessage

        private void handleUnoMessage()
        Set the 'uno' flag on the current player to true
        Sends the new info about the uno status to all players

      • sendWin

        private void sendWin()
        Sends info that the game is over to all players.
        It also sends the list of what place each player ended up on.

      • sendNextTurn

        private void sendNextTurn()
        Send data for a new turn to all players, that including:
        Players uno status, amount of cards, each player get's their cards,
        the currently played cards and that it's a new reound
